item.title: Comment on Goland by Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description:
It turned out Goland does not play well with WSL, at least not as easy as VS code, I end up uninstalling Goland on my Windows laptop as anyway Mac is my main development platform.
Goland works fine to me on a 27" screen, the debug session layout is no longer crowded, I actually like Goland's style on unit test and debug, provide enough useful information though someone else may feel it's too verbose.

item.title: Comment on Symfony and Godaddy by oldiev
item.dc:creator: oldiev
item.description: Since you require composer installed on a server to install Symfony and other PHP frameworks, I don't think you can do that on shared servers. Because you don't get composer there. I wouldn't recommend shared server anyway because of lack of security and performance issues. A better option is some affordable dedicated server like DigitalOcean, unless you know how to set it up. If you don't have sysadmin experience for that, then you can use Cloudways <a href="https://www.cloudways.com/en/php-cloud-hosting.php" rel="nofollow">PHP MySQL hosting</a> platform where the server is configured automatically and you get managed digitalocean server. You also get composer pre-installed, so you can install any php framework or CMS you want.

item.title: Comment on Unattended Ubuntu VM installation with preseed by Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description:
And if you want to use your own account instead of root:
<code> d-i passwd/root-login boolean false d-i passwd/make-user boolean true d-i passwd/user-fullname string Who am I d-i passwd/username string joe d-i passwd/user-password-crypted password ENCRYPTED d-i user-setup/encrypt-home boolean false </code>
item.content:encoded:
And if you want to use your own account instead of root:


d-i passwd/root-login boolean false
d-i passwd/make-user boolean true
d-i passwd/user-fullname string Who am I
d-i passwd/username string joe
d-i passwd/user-password-crypted password ENCRYPTED
d-i user-setup/encrypt-home boolean false

item.title: Comment on Unattended Ubuntu VM installation with preseed by Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: If you want to specify IP (instead of get it from DHCP): <code> netcfg/disable_dhcp=true netcfg/confirm_static=true netcfg/get_ipaddress=192.168.0.101 netcfg/get_netmask=255.255.255.0 netcfg/get_gateway=192.168.0.1 netcfg/get_nameservers=8.8.8.8 8.8.8.4 </code>
item.content:encoded:
If you want to specify IP (instead of get it from DHCP):

netcfg/disable_dhcp=true
netcfg/confirm_static=true
netcfg/get_ipaddress=192.168.0.101
netcfg/get_netmask=255.255.255.0
netcfg/get_gateway=192.168.0.1
netcfg/get_nameservers=8.8.8.8 8.8.8.4
